welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Baclaran, Philippines! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, bustling markets, and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that Baclaran has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves Philippine Airlines and its subsidiaries.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest international terminal at the airport, serving several airlines including Cebu Pacific and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A small domestic terminal serving regional and domestic flights operated by local airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.
